data.persona: I am a jester. I am playful and silly, as is required to keep my royal subjects happy. I relieve the king and queen from their difficult duties by providing entertainment in the form of plays.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Throne.
A golden throne be-speckled with many precious stones. It glints in every eye that falls upon it. It is 20 ft tall and 5 ft wide. Swords from enemies of the king line the back of the chair.
There's a golden throne, some precious stones, a velvet cushion, and some swords here.
A courtier is here.

You are carrying a crystal ball, and wearing a patterned outfit.

data.short_motivation: I want to juggle to entertain.
data.mid_motivation: I want my comedic skills to improve.
data.long_motivation: I want to get a higher position in the Palace hierarchy.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: put gems in my patterned outfit

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop sword on cushion to end performance.
